name: Cosm: Deep Dive Edition
description:
My tribute to the classic "hollywood hacker" movies, where the hacker's fingers are constantly moving as random junk flies across the monitor.

Cosm: Deep Dive Edition takes everything people loved about the original, and goes even further.
  • Deep Dive is endless! Hack and collect money until you're either detected or run out of time. Try to get the highest score!
  • Options for complex passwords and adjustable speed!
  • A hidden easter egg!
  • The same snarky humor as the original, now in a true arcadelike experience!
If you find anything broken, please let me know! You can contact me here, or on Twitter @db_twit.Please note that this is a single-player game. It is NOT intended to be two-player. Although I suppose you could do two-player if you really wanted to. If anyone tries it this way, please let me know!

The original Cosm can be freely downloaded at http://daveisawesome.itch.io/cosm - this is an enhanced version.

Since the first Cosm was an entry for the 2014 Cyberpunk Jam, I didn't want to touch that. It will remain available in its original form.
